description: This file defines a chatbot agent named 'StudyBuddy' for a WhatsApp API integration, including its memory, tools, and instructions for personalized learning assistance.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with memory, tools, and behavior configurations.

classes.name: WhatsappAPI
classes.description: API interface for WhatsApp integration with the agent.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: SQLite database wrapper for memory storage.

classes.name: MemoryManager
classes.description: Manages the memory operations for the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A language model used for the agent's reasoning.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Retrieves the FastAPI app instance from the WhatsApp API object.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the WhatsApp API server with specified app, port, and reload options.
